document.full_text: pittsburgh steelers wide receiver hines ward danced his way to victory on tuesday to win the 12th season of the hit celebrity tv competition, "dancing with the stars.
document.title: hines ward scores "dancing with the stars" win
lines_and_colors: pittsburgh steelers wide receiver hines ward danced his way to victory on tuesday to win the 12th season of the hit celebrity tv competition, "dancing with the stars.
